FuncDef: The display cpu-usage threshold command is used to show the CPU usage overload threshold and recovery threshold. The display cpu-usage threshold command is used to show the CPU usage overload threshold and recovery threshold.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an available slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies an available CPU ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.
